statements: SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, gender, location FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, social_media_handles FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'New York' AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT count(*), gender FROM customer_demographics GROUP BY gender;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender, location, social_media_handles FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location = 'California';
SELECT customer_id, UPPER(customer_name) AS customer_name_upper, CONCAT('Age:', age) AS age_info, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data;
SELECT username, age, location FROM social_media_data;
SELECT user_id, username, gender FROM social_media_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_gender = 'Female';
SELECT strategy_name, budget FROM marketing_strategies WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender, location FROM social_media_data
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_gender = 'Male'
SELECT user_id, username FROM social_media_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT strategy_name, target_age_group FROM marketing_strategies WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY strategy_name DESC
SELECT user_id, location FROM social_media_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 18 AND 25
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_comments FROM comments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'M' AND location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, username, date_joined FROM users WHERE location LIKE '%California%' AND age IS NOT NULL;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.post_content, c.comment_text FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN comments c ON p.post_id = c.post_id WHERE u.age < 40 AND c.comment_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(like_id) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content, comments.comment_content FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT users.username, likes.like_date FROM users INNER JOIN likes ON users.user_id = likes.user_id WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY like_date ASC;
SELECT posts.post_content, comments.comment_content FROM posts INNER JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE comments.comment_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY posts.post_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(like_id) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY user_id HAVING like_count > 10;
SELECT u.username, c.comment_text FROM users u JOIN comments c ON u.id = c.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT post_text, likes FROM posts WHERE post_date >= '2021-01-01' AND post_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT username, location FROM users INNER JOIN followers ON users.id = followers.user_id WHERE followers.follower_user_id = 123;

SELECT users.username, posts.post_text, likes.like_date FROM users INNER JOIN posts ON users.id = posts.user_id INNER JOIN likes ON posts.post_id = likes.post_id WHERE users.age < 25 AND likes.like_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY likes.like_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts, users.username FROM posts INNER JOIN users ON posts.user_id = users.id GROUP BY users.username HAVING total_posts > 5 ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
